name: Eternal Night Vale
description:
A fan art made for the extraordinary podcast Welcome to Night Vale

I'm not affiliated with Night Vale in any way, except through love, and who could trust an affiliation like that?

http://www.brightspiral.com/

This is made with Tracery, a tool that I am developing as part of a PhD dissertation at UC Santa Cruz. Don't use Bright Spiral, just yet. It'll only get better with time. I'll let you know when the party start.
